venue.address_2: Actual address is 550 but wrong on Google
venue.name: Seacoast Family YMCA

item.description:
PORTSMOUTH YMCA Pool Session 

Sponsored by NSPN
Sunday: 3:00-6:00pm

COST: $25

Make check payable to NSPN

I have reserved the Seacoast YMCA pool in Portsmouth NH for Sunday December 18th from 3-6pm for NSPN. Since there are still a few openings for this session, I have reserved 4 spots for Northeast Seacoast Paddlers.

This kayak pool sessions will provide you an opportunity to practice or learn safety skills including wet exiting, self and assisted rescues, bracing and rolling techniques. This is a self paced "learn on your own" format there will not be any formal or professional instruction however there will be other experienced paddlers there to give you tips and assistance as well as spot people practicing rolling. Cost is $25 per person based on a maximum of 12 people attending. I do need to collect the money in advance to insure full attendance for this session. 

You must bring your own kayak, PFD, Paddle etc.. Please be sure your kayak is very clean inside and out.

Please RSVP and I will contact you with arrangements on how to get advanced payment to me via PayPal. If you send a check, it must be received no later than this Saturday the 17th.

Mail check to:
Doug Mogill P.O. Box 341, Derry NH 03038

Checks must be made payable to NSPN
item.name: PORTSMOUTH YMCA POOL SESSION
